Uses of Interface
com.forgerock.reactive.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.reactive
    Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure.

    • Uses of Action in com.forgerock.reactive

      Methods in com.forgerock.reactive with parameters of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Completable Completable.doAfterTerminate(Action onAfterTerminate)
      Returns a Completable instance that calls the given onTerminate callback after this Completable completes normally or with an exception.
      Stream<V> Stream.onComplete(Action onComplete)
      Invokes the on complete Action when this stream is completed.
      void Completable.subscribe(Action completeAction, Consumer<Throwable> errorConsumer)
      Subscribe to the result of this Completable.
